title_localized.en: Welcome to the New Manhattan Club Owners Website

image.name: manhattan-club-welcome-new-website
image.description: Welcome to the New Manhattan Club Owners Website

meta_description_localized.en: Welcome to the New Manhattan Club Owners Website

post_content_localized.en:
We've done a digital redesign! To better serve our valued owners, we've redesigned our website from top to bottom. You'll now find a number of sections on the site to describe who we are, what we do, and most importantly, what's in store for you at your beautiful home away from home in Manhattan.

About

If you’re new to this site, read on. If you already know us, let’s get reacquainted. Read a brief history about how The Manhattan Club came to be, learn about our journey and meet the team behind everything that makes us your New York home.  

Ownership

Have you always wondered what it would be like to live in New York City? The Manhattan Club features luxury amenities, comfortable suites and exclusive owner events that highlight the best of the city. Enjoy the pleasure of exploring Manhattan and its countless attractions at your leisure.

Owner Experience

Our owners continue coming back for many reasons. In this section, we’ve included an event calendar that features the hottest happenings in New York. Consult our owner and executive newsletters or, better yet, sign up to receive them directly in your inbox.

How to Contact Us

No matter where you’re coming from or where you’re going, The Manhattan Club is at your disposal. You can reach us via phone, email or by filling out the contact form. Our experienced front desk staff can assist with travel plans, dining recommendations, ticket reservations, tourist information and everything in between.

Take a Look at our Blog

Our blog got a facelift. Apart from having a brand new design, we’ve organized the content into key categories to facilitate navigation and ensure that you find what you need.

NYC Attractions and Events
As a beacon of the finest art, culture and entertainment in the world, New York never stops reinventing itself. Begin each brand new adventure here.

Owners Events
The exclusivity of our residence-style boutique property includes unique experiences and tours tailored to show you the best of the city that never sleeps.

Concierge Recommendations
Be the first to hear about the hottest theater productions and the latest museum exhibits. This is your key to seeing New York from the eyes of the locals.

Seasonal Things to Do
Whether you want to take a stroll in Central Park on a hot, summer day or shop at a quaint Christmas market, New York has it all. Here’s your guide to the city’s top seasonal experiences.  

Food & Drink
International gourmet cuisine? Check. Epic signature drinks? Check. Experience New York through your palate. Find out where to go to challenge your tastebuds and create memorable moments.

With a revamped website, fresh blog content and the service our owners have come to expect from us, you have everything to make your time in New York perfect. We look forward to serving you online and welcoming you in person.

post_excerpt_localized.en: We've done a digital redesign! To better serve our valued owners, we've redesigned our website from top to bottom.
